summary: When a wealthy man is threatened by a killer known as The Gorilla, he hires the Ritz Brothers to investigate. A real escaped gorilla shows up at the mansion just as the investigators arrive.
cast: The Ritz Brothers|Jimmy Ritz|Harry Ritz|Al Ritz|Anita Louise|Patsy Kelly|Lionel Atwill|Bela Lugosi|Joseph Calleia|Edward Norris|Wally Vernon|Paul Harvey|Art Miles
keywords: psychotronic film|old dark house|cut telephone line|private investigator|escaped animal
title: El gorila
